movies.title: Body in the Web
movies.plot: En route to a show in Singapore, a troupe of beautiful dancers are stranded on a deserted island by a plane crash. Their routine of skinny-dipping and devising new skimpy outfits is interrupted when a radioactive spider bites their manager and turns him into a wild-eyed, furry-faced monster with three fangs and a passion for strangling.
movies.simplePlot: Survivors of a plane crash on a remote island find it is covered by spiders. When bitten, the survivors start turning into spiders!

biography.bio: Harald Maresch was born on June 10, 1916 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Body in the Web (1960), Many Passed By (1956) and Das veilchenblaue Auto (1961). He died on December 7, 1986 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
biography.name: Harald Maresch

biography.bio: Helga Franck was born in 1933 in Lübeck, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. She was an actress, known for Body in the Web (1960), Heiraten verboten (1957) and Boulevard des plaisirs (1954). She was married to Lothar E. Stickelbrucks. She died in February 1963 in Munich, West Germany [now Germany].
biography.name: Helga Franck

biography.bio: Alexander D'Arcy was born on August 10, 1908 in Cairo, Egypt as Alexander Sarruf. He was an actor, known for The Awful Truth (1937), How to Marry a Millionaire (1953) and Body in the Web (1960). He was married to Arleen Whelan. He died on April 20, 1996 in West Hollywood, California, USA.
biography.name: Alexander D'Arcy

biography.bio: Helga Neuner was born on June 10, 1940 in Munich, Germany. She is an actress, known for Body in the Web (1960), Die Firma Hesselbach (1960) and The Family Schimek (1957). She was previously married to Rolf A. Wilhelm.
biography.name: Helga Neuner

biography.bio: Rainer Brandt was born on January 19, 1936 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Body in the Web (1960), Funeral in Berlin (1966) and Alles im Eimer (1981). He is married to Ursula Heyer.
biography.name: Rainer Brandt

biography.bio: Dorothee Parker is an actress and assistant director, known for Body in the Web (1960), Mission to Hell (1964) and Les chercheurs d'or de l'Arkansas (1964).
biography.name: Dorothee Parker

biography.bio: Gerry Sammer is an actress, known for Body in the Web (1960), Chikita (1962) and Proibitissimo (1963).
biography.name: Gerry Sammer

biography.placeOfBirth: Free City of Danzig [now Gdansk, Pomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Eva Schauland was born in 1935 in Free City of Danzig [now Gdansk, Pomorskie, Poland] as Eva Mauerhof. She is an actress, known for Body in the Web (1960), Zu viele Köche (1961) and Poupées d'amour (1960).
biography.name: Eva Schauland

biography.bio: Helma Vandenberg is an actress, known for Body in the Web (1960) and The Festival Girls (1961).
biography.name: Helma Vandenberg

biography.bio: Elfie Wagner is an actress, known for Body in the Web (1960).
biography.name: Elfie Wagner

biography.bio: Barbara Valentin was born on December 15, 1940 in Vienna, Austria as Ursula Ledersteger. She was an actress, known for World on a Wire (1973), Martha (1974) and Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974). She was married to John Ashton and Helmut Dietl. She died on February 22, 2002 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Barbara Valentin

biography.bio: Walter Faber is an actor, known for Body in the Web (1960), Flitterwochen in der Hölle (1960) and Die drei Scheinheiligen (1964).
biography.name: Walter Faber
